blocks.name: bj-a1k
blocks.content: Weakening of ~ ax-1 . This shortens the proofs of ~ dfwe2 (937>925), ~ ordunisuc2 (789>777), ~ r111 (558>545), ~ smo11 (1176>1164). (Contributed by BJ, 11-Aug-2020.)
